tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: First time I visited The Smile’s Centre Dental Clinic.  I am highly impressed the way of hospitality and treatment procedure explanation and experience what I had during RCT.  I strongly recommend to visit for any teeth concerns

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited the doctor for the first time for root canal treatment. I was so scared to take the treatment as I had a very bad experience with rct with other doctor. But Dr. Vikasini has done the treatment  very professionally without causing  any pain. I am very much satisfied with her treatment and I highly recommend her for any kind of dental treatment. She is very friendly and explains the problem very clearly before doing the procedure.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Doctor explains the problem well and will not hurry you for subsequent treatment. 
Checks thoroughly

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Inetraction with me is very good and explained in detail about my problem and the solution. Happy to see the doctor.
